title: Virtual Amazon Seller Central Specialist – Furniture
job_overview:
Job Title: Virtual Amazon Seller Central Specialist – Furniture
Company: AYLA Home Collection
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-Time

About AYLA Home Collection:
AYLA Home Collection is a California-based furniture brand offering premium-quality pieces designed to elevate everyday living. We’re launching our online Amazon store and are looking for a Virtual Amazon Seller Central Specialist to manage and grow our Amazon presence. This is a remote position focused exclusively on managing our Amazon Seller Central account—no physical store or in-person responsibilities involved.

Role Summary:
You will be responsible for managing the entire Amazon Seller Central operations—from product listing to optimization, inventory management, and advertising—with a focus on our furniture products such as sofas, coffee tables, dining sets, storage pieces and more.

Key Responsibilities:
 Set up and manage our Amazon Seller Central account for AYLA Home Collection.
 Create, optimize, and maintain product listings tailored for furniture, ensuring high-quality titles, bullet points, descriptions, and images.
Conduct keyword research and apply Amazon SEO best practices to maximize visibility.
Monitor sales performance, customer feedback, and key metrics.
Plan and manage advertising campaigns (Amazon PPC) and promotions (coupons, Lightning Deals, etc.).
Manage inventory levels and coordinate with our fulfillment team to avoid stockouts or overstock situations.
Resolve listing issues, suppressed listings, and address Amazon policy compliance.
Respond promptly to customer inquiries and issues to maintain a high feedback rating.

Qualifications:
Minimum 1 year of experience managing an Amazon Seller Central account (home/furniture category preferred).
Strong understanding of Amazon SEO, listing optimization, and ad management.
Excellent attention to detail, organization, and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
You’re analytical, organized, and results-driven with a passion for e-commerce.
